attributes.action: ban alcohol and cigarettes from sale in uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: alcohol and cigarettes should be banned in the uk as thy are a danger to public health

rejection.details: There are several existing petitions which overlap with yours e.g. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Illegalsmoking/ and http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ban-alcohol/ If you still wish to lodge this petition, please re-submit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
